141.content:
Another day. Another Time Piece is stolen from Hat Kid by Mustache Girl. Currently both girls were actually having a tug of war match with Hat Kid trying to get it from her.

"Let go you stupid kid!" Mustache Girl yells angrily

"You let go! It's mine!" Hat Kid yells back

They both kept pulling and the inevitable happened. It broke and the sand inside only got on Hat Kid and she was covered in it and she coughed. At first nothing seemed to happen but then Mustache Girl watches as Hat Kid turns into a little baby looking terrified. She still thankfully had her big girl mind and was surrounded by a pile of her clothes since they were too big now. Hat Kid. Or Hat Baby since it's more fitting now. looks up at Mustache Girl fearfully,

142.content:
Hat Kid had to go in to the old Manor of Queen Vanessa. "who's in my house." Hat Kid heard and crawling away in fear. She saw queen Vanessa approached her having no place to hide. Queen Vanessa grabbed Hat Kid and was about to freeze her but noticed Hat Kid had pissed herself out of fear. Queen Vanessa Then desided to not freeze Hat Kid but instead she used some other magic on Hat Kid. Then next thing Hat Kid knew was she was in a crib dressed like a baby yet she felt like it was normal. She looked around and could tell she was still in the Manor yet she felt safe and she couldn't remember why she was here in the first place.

Queen Vanessa hold Hat Kids old personality in a jar which she store the rest of old souls she keeped. Queen Vanessa knew Hat Kid will turn into a baby over time the more she's treated like one so for now leaving Hat Kid alone for to long could effect her differently.

Hat Kid looked around as she soon felt a messy felling between her legs. She looked down to notice a full diaper. "I didn't even have to go." Hat Kid said and soon felt tears form in her eyes just then Queen Vanessa entered. "Mommy I need a change." Hat Kid said holding back her tears. "aw it's alright sweetie that's why you wear diapers we'll potty train you soon." Queen Vanessa said as she left Hat Kid and changed her diaper she then bottle feed Hat Kid who then fell back asleep.

Queen Vanessa noticed that Hat Kid shrink in size and was know the size of a 2 year old. Queen Vanessa heard another noise and went to go seek out what it was.
Bow Kid entered the Manor to try and found Hat Kid what happens to her.

Hat Kid was visiting the Nyankuza Metro when she suddenly felt herself being lifted off the ground.

She was turned around to see that Empress was carrying her.

"Konnichiwa, Hat Kid," Empress with something civility, though her tone suggested she wasn't very happy, "I hope you haven't forgotten me, I know I haven't forgotten you and what you did to me."

Hat Kid was scared, so much so that she found herself wetting her pants, which Empress easily noticed with some amusement.

15412.content:
When Empress and Hat Kid arrived to Empress' home, Hat Kid was surprised to see Empress lived in a remarkably fancy penthouse that mixed ultra-modern with some traditional Japanese trappings.

Hat Kid saw a fully supplied changing table that was perfect for a kid her size, but was surprised when Empress carried her past it.

"I thought you said you were gonna diaper me," Hat Kid remarked.

"Oh, I promise we'll get to that," Empress replied, "But there's something else you need first and foremost."

Empress carried Hat Kid into what looked like a small indoor onsen.

Empress then put Hat Kid down and immediately stripped her of all her clothes until Hat Kid was 100% naked, she didn't even wear her hair tie!

Empress then whistled and some of her Underlings entered the room. Empress handed them Hat Kid's clothes.

"Take these and burn them immediately. Afterward find the other girl, you know what to do before you bring her here."

The Underlings bowed slightly and left.

Empress then sat the naked Hat Kid on a stool and started scrubbing her.

"W-who's the other girl you talked about?" Hat Kid asked.

"Just someone else I decided to add this little 'family' of ours," Empress replied as she finished her scrubbing and dumped a bucket of water on Hat Kid to rinse her before putting her in the bath proper to soak.

"In fact, I think you already know this 'other girl'."

Just moments later, The Underlings shoved another girl around Hat Kid's age into the Onsen. Though the girl was stripped naked too, Hat Kid recognized her. She was-

"Not in the slightest," Empress replied, "I hope you're not too attached to the times you used a toilet. Because those days are going to be a distant memory at best."

How does Empress made both girls incontinent?

"Not anymore little girl. Now this will be used a good bit by me" As she says this she sends some of the dust that was in it at their diaper areas.

Mustache Girl coughs a bit "What did you do!?!"

"You'll see" Empress says plainly. Both girls then gasp as they feel their diapers getting warmer and soggy.
